title: 325btc
author: 325btc
content: Anyone who speak about covid should get benalty or jail.Only this way we can stop covid non sense.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Laws don't do anything if they can't be or aren't enforced. There are loads of laws on the books that have never been enforced. New laws are the things that government politicians use to make it look like they are doing something... to make it look like they are needed even a little.In the USA, as long as we don't slander anyone directly, there is freedom of speech. That's why Big Pharma can get away with telling their lies about Covid and the vaxx. It isn't their fault if people are stupid enough to believe them. It's the fault of the people for not checking it out themselves... rather than having blind faith.Some people have checked it out and have found that Covid is a lie, and that the vaxx is killing people - https://openvaers.com/ and https://openvaers.com/faq/what-is-underreporting-and-why-it-matters. If people don't look at the proof in these two websites alone, whose fault is it?

comments.author: Cnut237
comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on July 10, 2022, 05:36:03 PMAnyone who speak about covid should get benalty or jail.Only this way we can stop covid non sense."Benalty"? It sounds as though you have a blocked nose, which I believe is a symptom of Covid. May I advise vaccination? It's safe and effective, as countless studies over the last 18 months have demonstrated.As a second point, if your aim is to get people to stop talking about Covid, then setting up a thread for people to talk about Covid is probably not the greatest idea.Quote from: BADecker on July 10, 2022, 05:56:41 PMblind faith.Yeah, blind faith is for those who ignore the data, isn't it?

comments.author: GiftedMAN
comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on July 10, 2022, 05:36:03 PMAnyone who speak about covid should get benalty or jail.Only this way we can stop covid non sense.OP, I believe you meant penalty because I can not figure out the meaning of the word Benalty that you used here I suggest you edit your work then post it again. Talking about the Jail penalty you suggest to be the punishment for anyone who talks about Covid, are you in any way saying that Covid is not real or never existed?  Do you have clear proof to support your view since you believe that the virus that has claimed the lives of thousands of people in the world shouldn't be talked about, well I may not know your notion for saying this because in my country, so many lives were lost as a result of Covid. I will suggest you come up with a better explanation so that we can understand you better.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: Cnut237 on July 12, 2022, 10:06:00 AM...Quote from: BADecker on July 10, 2022, 05:56:41 PMblind faith.Yeah, blind faith is for those who ignore the data, isn't it?  Your so-called data is a lie - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5405823.msg60556103#msg60556103.

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: if you think covid disappears by not saying a word. then you have no clue about science, biology, logic, facts, life, common sense.yes covid is no longer devastating and this years strain as people get the virus, their body is showing the 'common' symptoms of flem and snotty nose, which shows the body is recognising the virus now and fighting it early. so yes it is becoming part of the common flu range of viruses. but to pretend there is no virus or pretend that its just a word. is idiotic and ignorantits much like all sanitised education.. thinking if you an stop someone talking about it, means it never happened. like how trumpettes want education to stop talking about the nazi's and slave masters in history. pretending that it didnt happen or that its just meaningless words. is ignorant and idiotic

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: franky1 on July 12, 2022, 03:48:15 PMif you think covid disappears by not saying a word. then you have no clue about science, biology, logic, facts, life, common sense. - Even though that is basically the way it is - Covid disappears by not saying a word - things are not as simple as that. People can write the word "Covid". And that makes Covid appear to whomever reads the writing, more than it would if they had simply heard it spoken. However, none of the speaking or writing proves what Covid is. And observations all over the world are showing us that Covid is different things at different times for different people.yes covid is no longer devastating and this years strain as people get the virus, their body is showing the 'common' symptoms of flem and snotty nose, which shows the body is recognising the virus now and fighting it early. so yes it is becoming part of the common flu range of viruses. but to pretend there is no virus or pretend that its just a word. is idiotic and ignorant - Pretending that there is no virus is idiotic and ignorant. This is just the same as pretending that there is such a thing as a virus without proof. Right now Cnut is trying to show some websites where viruses have been proven to exist. All he has is the simple reports. He doesn't have the lab process records where it actually was done... the step by step doing of the actual, real isolating of the virus. So far, you haven't shown any either. Come on. Show us the research notebook and video, the in-process isolation of the virus, where the result is the virus, itself - the machines used as the process is being done, and the researcher telling us all about everything he is doing at every step in the isolation process. And then, show us the most important part... where the virus was injected into a bunch of test subjects and they got sick. If you can really do this, Dr. Kaufman would be most interested.its much like all sanitised education.. thinking if you an stop someone talking about it, means it never happened. like how trumpettes want education to stop talking about the nazi's and slave masters in history. pretending that it didnt happen or that its just meaningless words. is ignorant and idioticThat's right. Sanitized education. Education about isolation that never was done, so the whole thing is a big science fiction story. Or show us the gory details.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: franky1 on July 12, 2022, 03:48:15 PMif you think covid disappears by not saying a word. then you have no clue about science, biology, logic, facts, life, common sense.---If you look at the post history of BADecker, it should be kind of obvious his mission is just spreading chaos and misinformation.

comments.author: TheNineClub
comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on July 10, 2022, 05:36:03 PMAnyone who speak about covid should get benalty or jail.Only this way we can stop covid non sense.Wait what? That would only fule the conspiracy ideas, that's a bad idea. And also, fredom of speech is still a thing in most of the world and needs to be upheld weather you like it or not. There will always be stupid people out there, but they have a right to express their opinion.

comments.author: ireor
comments.body: Why is the hate with Covid-19 virus talks?! But be sure to actually hate the virus  Covid-19 is actually a real virus, not propaganda created by governments, although I also probably thought the same at some point of time, but after being infected with it once and enjoying the suffering from it, I think I have learnt my lesson in a hard way

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: ireor on July 14, 2022, 04:32:42 PMWhy is the hate with Covid-19 virus talks?! But be sure to actually hate the virus  Covid-19 is actually a real virus, not propaganda created by governments, although I also probably thought the same at some point of time, but after being infected with it once and enjoying the suffering from it, I think I have learnt my lesson in a hard way  But for you, all viruses including Covid are talk that you hear government and doctors talk. Unless you go out and do the research yourself, viruses are simply a religion for you. You believe what you hear, whether or not it is the truth. So, have fun in your religion.
